Ggoogle

Logo

src/components/logo/style.less

Logo for the page-header

Requires mui-header-logo
Requires mui-image

Zenlauncher

Source code (Pug)
.mui-header-logo.ui-logo
    img.mui-image.-js-lazy-load(data-src='../images/icon128.png' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7' alt='logo')
    noscript
        img.mui-image(src='../images/icon128.png' alt='logo')
    h1.heading._bigger-0._line-4r
        span.first Zen
        span.second launcher

Urls form

src/components/urls-form/style.less

...

(!) UrlsForm - Use Muilessium.get('UrlsForm', id) to get it.
Requires mui-input
Requires mui-textarea
Requires mui-button
Requires mui-svg-icon
 Save
Source code (Pug)
.ui-urls-form
    .mui-input-wrapper
        .mui-textarea#docs-only-id--urls-form-textarea
            textarea(placeholder='Specify the URLs (one per line)')
    ._separate-1._text-center
        a.mui-button.-cyan-3-bg.-f-green-3-bg#docs-only-id--urls-form-button
            svg.mui-svg-icon
                use(xlink:href='#mui-svg-icon--check')
            span &nbsp;Save
    ._separate-1._text-center
        .mui-svg-spinner
            svg.mui-svg-icon
                use(xlink:href='#mui-svg-icon--spinner')
